30040000.text:
You're late, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Master</>! Haha.
Long time no see!

30040004.text:
The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Scout Captain</> is handling the business with the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hoglins</>.
Please go to talk to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Scout Captain</>.

30040005.text:
Is it okay to trust <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hogdon</>?
Well, that's the only thing we can do for now...

30040006.text:
Accepting help from the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hoglins</>!
What are the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>elder</> and <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>leader</> thinking?

30040007.text:
I guess they have a plan.
We have no choice but to trust and follow them.

30040008.text:
What will happen to our tribe?
I miss the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Moonwater Plains</>...

30040009.text:
Good luck!
The fate of our tribe is all up to you two!

30040011.text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hoguno</> already filled me in.
Impressive work!

30040012.text:
The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Daybreak</> is putting up a tougher resistance than I expected.
I think it's time to consider reinforcements.

30040013.text:
Who is that person with the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>master</>?
I feel a strange energy coming from them.

30040014.text:
Who's this astonishingly strong person who came to help us?
Huh?! Is that...?

30040015.text:
Urgh... I messed up.
Are you okay?

30040016.text:
Worry about yourself before worrying about me.
You're bleeding pretty badly.

30040020.text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Aran</>, I'm so honored to be with you!

30040021.text:
What should we do, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>sir</>?
Beyond this is a cliff.

30040022.text:
I think this height is doable,
don't you think?

30040023.text:
H-hey! Will he ever grow up?
He should be helping the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>master</> out!

30040024.text: Oh, now isn't the time for this.

30040025.text: You're right. Should we come back later?

30040026.text:
How did <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Brother Sigook</> end up so twisted?
He was so kind when he was younger...

30040027.text:
What's he doing, riding that <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>old cableway</>? Is he crazy?
How did he get like this...?
